instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message:
person dropped baby milk on the side of the MacBook, only the battery was affected. The logic board looked brand new. It works fine, but won’t boot up if trackpad is connected. Keeps going in a loop. Tried It on a working top case


Edit: it only boots sometimes. Even with the trackpad disconnected it’s still looping

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message: I have no idea with the newer stuff. I've only seen a handful and there are no schematics. Inspect the touchpad connector.

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message:
Touchpad connector looks perfect. Even with the trackpad disconnected it boots when it wants to. 

Really worried about this since it’s a high specd machine

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message: The board looks brand new so pop it in a clean case and send it to Apple.

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message: I don’t ever come accross these 15”s, this one is out of warrenty.

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message:
I’m currently trying to run it directly off the power supply, there’s no battery inside, I think that’s the problem.

a1618 battery’s for this 2015 model are rare in uk, will a 2014 battery work?

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message: I have no idea as I have no experience with these. You should at least run it off a 87W charger, not a 61W.

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message: i am running it off its original 85w charger

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message: It may need a battery connected, I really have no idea with this new stuff.

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message:
Yes, got a new battery today and it seems to work absolutely fine. 

Looks like the 15” 2013-2015 need a battery connected for it to work.

threads.title: 820-00426 not booting with trackpad attached
threads.message: Ok, thanks for sharing that info, learned something myself today.
